exec: pm.test("Successfully created all review entities", function () {

body.raw:
{
    "write-system-config": {
        "entity": "product_review",
        "action": "upsert",
        "payload": [
             {
                "id": "{{product_review_disabled_id}}",
                "productId": "{{catalog_product_disabled}}",
                "salesChannelId": "{{gen_salesChannel_id}}",
                "languageId": "{{system_default_language}}",
                "title": "{{$randomLoremWords}}",
                "content": "{{$randomLoremSentence}}",
                "points": "2",
                "status": true
            },
            {
                "id": "{{product_review_props_id}}",
                "productId": "{{catalog_product_props}}",
                "salesChannelId": "{{gen_salesChannel_id}}",
                "languageId": "{{system_default_language}}",
                "title": "Main product review",
                "content": "Main product long content",
                "points": 4.4,
                "status": true
            },
            {
                "id": "{{product_review_child_id}}",
                "productId": "{{gen_product_variant_child_id}}",
                "salesChannelId": "{{gen_salesChannel_id}}",
                "languageId": "{{gen_language_german_id}}",
                "title": "German Title",
                "content": "German Content",
                "points": 3.7,
                "status": true
            },
            {
                "id": "{{product_review_freeShip_disabled_id}}",
                "productId": "{{catalog_product_freeShip}}",
                "salesChannelId": "{{gen_salesChannel_id}}",
                "languageId": "{{gen_language_german_id}}",
                "title": "Disabled review",
                "content": "Not approved by merchant",
                "points": 3,
                "status": false,
                "customerId": "{{customer_default_id}}"
            }
        ]
    }
}

body.raw:
{
    "write-system-config": {
        "entity": "product_review",
        "action": "upsert",
        "payload": [
            {
                "id": "{{product_review_props_customer_id}}",
                "productId": "{{catalog_product_props}}",
                "salesChannelId": "{{gen_salesChannel_headless_id}}",
                "languageId": "{{system_default_language}}",
                "title": "Customer attached review",
                "content": "Customer attached review description",
                "points": 2.7,
                "status": true,
                "customerId": "{{customer_default_id}}"
            },
            {
                "id": "{{created_review_headless_advPriceOne_id}}",
                "productId": "{{created_product_headless_advPriceOne_id}}",
                "salesChannelId": "{{gen_salesChannel_headless_id}}",
                "languageId": "{{gen_language_german_id}}",
                "title": "API: Review title 2 (DE)",
                "content": "API: Review content 2 (DE)",
                "points": 5,
                "status": true,
                "customerId": "{{created_customer_withCustomGrp_id}}"
            },
            {
                "id": "{{product_review_freeShip_id}}",
                "productId": "{{catalog_product_freeShip}}",
                "salesChannelId": "{{gen_salesChannel_headless_id}}",
                "languageId": "{{gen_language_german_id}}",
                "title": "Secondary channel review",
                "content": "German Content too",
                "points": 1.1,
                "status": true
            }
        ]
    }
}
